title: Cherub
data:

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Behold! A throne-bearer of the Gods, whose head is beset by four faces: one of a man, one of an ox, one of a lion, one of an eagle. It is one of the three angelic beings who stand before the good gods, singing eternal hymns of praise to their Glory and Goodness. Indeed, these hymns have the power to rouse greatness in hearts pure and true.***“The glory of Yahweh mounted up from the cherub, and stood over the threshold of the house; and the house was filled with the cloud, and the court was full of the brightness of Yahweh’s glory. The sound of the wings of the cherubim was heard even to the outer court, as the voice of God Almighty when he speaks.” -WEB Bible, Ezekiel 10:4-5 |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Cherubim** are flying holy beings with a 6-tile halo [aura](/Aura "Aura"). Although less dangerous than [angels](/Angel "Angel") or [daevas](/Daeva "Daeva"), they tend to wield decent weapons of [flaming](/Flaming "Flaming") or [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") and fire [longbows](/Longbow "Longbow") at you. They are rare, only appearing in the [Abyss](/Abyss "Abyss") and holy-themed [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium") and [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat") floors.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                     |                                                    |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Battlecry](/Battlecry "Battlecry") | [Vocal flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Like [orc knights](/Orc_knight "Orc knight"), cherubim have a [Battlecry](/Battlecry "Battlecry") ability that allows them to empower monsters around them, causing these allies to deal +30% damage.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), cherubim could [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible").
html:
Cherub

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all holy monsters, see list of holy monsters.

cherub A 
HP 50-102
HD 9
XP 744
Speed 10
AC 12
EV 20
Will 100
Attack1 15 (hit: plain)
Attack2 8 (peck: plain)


Resistances rF+
rElec
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rHoly
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Holy
Size Medium
Type angel, cherub
Flags Fighter
Archer
Flying
Speaks
Behold! A throne-bearer of the Gods, whose head is beset by four faces: one of a man, one of an ox, one of a lion, one of an eagle. It is one of the three angelic beings who stand before the good gods, singing eternal hymns of praise to their Glory and Goodness. Indeed, these hymns have the power to rouse greatness in hearts pure and true.

“The glory of Yahweh mounted up from the cherub, and stood over the threshold of the house; and the house was filled with the cloud, and the court was full of the brightness of Yahweh’s glory.
The sound of the wings of the cherubim was heard even to the outer court, as the voice of God Almighty when he speaks.”
-WEB Bible, Ezekiel 10:4-5

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Cherubim are flying holy beings with a 6-tile halo aura. Although less dangerous than angels or daevas, they tend to wield decent weapons of flaming or holy wrath and fire longbows at you. They are rare, only appearing in the Abyss and holy-themed Pandemonium and Ziggurat floors.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Battlecry Vocal flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Like orc knights, cherubim have a Battlecry ability that allows them to empower monsters around them, causing these allies to deal +30% damage.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, cherubim could see invisible.
